i18n.key: In order to access the RBS Change administration interface, please use the Firefox 3.0 web broswer.Thank you for your understanding.
To access and manage RBS Change back-office administration, you need to use the RBS Change manager extension.
check if the extension is installed

To check if the RBS Change manager extension is installed on your browser, please click on the ″Tools″ menu of Firefox, then on ″Add-ons″, tab ″Extensions″ et look for ″RBS Change Manager″ in the list of extensions (they are sorted out alphabetically).
If the RBS Change manager extension is not installed on your browser, click here.

You can connect to RBS Change via the ″Tools″ menu, by clicking on ″Connect to RBS Change...″ or by using the keypad shortcut Alt+c. The connexion window opens and you must type in the website’s URL, your ID and your password.
